org.apache.spf
Class SPF

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.spf.SPF

public class SPF
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to generate a SPF-Test and provided all intressting data. TODO: write a method which generate a explanation like descripted here: http://www.schlitt.net/spf/spf_classic/draft-schlitt-spf-classic-02.html#mod-exp

Author:
Mimecast Contact : spf@mimecast.net, Norman Maurer

checkSPF

public java.lang.String checkSPF(java.lang.String ipAddress,
                                 java.lang.String mailFrom,
                                 java.lang.String hostName)
Run check for SPF with the given values.

Parameters:
ipAddress - - the ipAddress the connection is comming from
mailFrom - - the mailFrom which was provided
hostName - - the hostname which was provided as HELO/EHLO
Returns:
the result. Possible results are: pass, neutral, fail, deny, softfail, error, none
